Review.Titre: Wouldn’t up my spending limit when I…
Review.Contenu: Wouldn’t up my spending limit when I have the money

I like the concept of the card, it’s phenomenal until something goes wrong. my card got frozen after a purchase I WAS TRYING TO MAKE and i can’t unfreeze it. its been over a week of repeated messages and emails to fizz but they don’t respond

Review.Titre: It’s been good for the purposes of…
Review.Contenu: It’s been good for the purposes of having a safe credit building method. The rewards is difficult to understand. Specifically, not knowing whether my local grocery will be labeled as a grocery store and therefore receive rewards. It would also be nice for the name of the purchases to show up that way when they are charged from the connected account.

I'm new to the world of regularly using a credit card month to month So this is my practice card. So far I like it.The only things I don't like as much are setting categories, paying them off at the end of the day, lack of reminder notifications from fizz.I have a grocery store that I shop at and it always gets marked as food and restaurants instead of groceries. So if you have the strange sounding grocery store, it's going to get marked as food and restaurants instead on your 3x bonus select food and restaurants.I am forgetful on if I have enough money in an account. I don't get notifications and I skim them like every 2 weeks. So if I miss a payment I won't know for until I check my email.Last thing is I wish I could pay them sooner than the end of the day cuz I've had times where I just completely forget about the fizz payment that I made earlier that day. My days meld together cuz everyone else's night is my day and my day is their nights. Other than the system and my system being confused on my purchases I think it's a great upcoming service that is currently in the potential phase and will move on to the fantastic phase.

As someone new to the world of credit, I’m a big fan of Fizz! I have a tendency to impulse buy, and it helps keep myself in check to make sure I don’t spend too much. The articles they have really help, and I like that you can choose your rewards category each month. I do wish they had more reward affiliates, and their help chat can take a bit long to respond, but otherwise I highly recommend it so far.
It’s reliable, you should use it to do minor shopping to make the best of the points. The card arrived relatively quick, never had an issue using it with any vendor.
As a company, they are actually doing great. Good communication and good brake system for payments too. If you are trying to transition to debit cards after using cc for a while, 100% recommend.

Review.Titre: I enjoy being able to use a credit card…
Review.Contenu: I enjoy being able to use a credit card like a debit card the only down fall really is it takes long if you have more then 30 over to actually appear on my bank but it’s something that can be look pass since it’s pretty hard to sync with banks
Easy to use, very reliable, does the job. However more features would be nice, very basic but decent enough for a first card.

Fizz achieves their credit building goal, but the app is lacking a search function for rewards, which is really frustrating. As long as the search function gets added soon, and more seasonal perks pop up, this service would be amazing.
Great team. However I have still not gotten a credit score after nearly 6 months. I was originally told 2 months.

Review.Titre: EDITED never got my physical card
Review.Contenu: never got my physical card. didnt get the first one for a month so I asked for another one, also never got it. felt like a scam when I was signing up. Otherwise probably great for other people, but not for meEDIT: Thanks to Fizz for reminding me to update this. I did contact customer support and receive a new card, I've been using it since then and it has been great.

Review.Titre: Get a credit line without deposit and…
Review.Contenu: Get a credit line without deposit and quick and easy to use

Review.Titre: the support team was very helpful and…
Review.Contenu: the support team was very helpful and understanding
I have had fizz a few months. I’m not a fan of the daily payments. But other than that I think it’s a great card to have in your wallet

Review.Titre: I love the Fizz card and application
Review.Contenu: I love the Fizz card and application, it is a really great way to not only build credit, but do so responsibly. Certainly a recommend to people who would like to build credit responsibly.

I love how simple the whole process is, it really takes the thinking part away when I’m budgeting. Connects to Apple Pay literally the day you sign up and you get a physical card 2 weeks later. Perfect for college students or people just trying to budget better. Literally can’t go wrong using this app. I got approved for a 350 credit limit (from 120) in like 2 months.

Review.Titre: It’s a very good fee-less way for…
Review.Contenu: It’s a very good fee-less way for college students to get their name out there in terms of credit. I personally haven’t had a job that requires filing a W-2 as of yet and thus no one would approve me even for a checking account. My social security number isn’t yet verifiable. Fizz gave me the chance that I needed!

The Fizz card has become one of my go to cards whenever im out and about or even just shopping online. Its pretty convenient to use and its credit building has already caused my credit score to rise by about 30 points in the few months ive owned it . Would recommend it for anyone who needs better credit

I’ve been with fizz for over a couple of months now this is always the card I use it helps me budget, I get cash back on what I want and NO INTEREST and NO MONTHLY fees you do need to be a student to signup. But if your a student take the shot this has only helped my credit and if you ever have problems support is very easy to reach  10/10

Review.Titre: Reliable, great benefit with little risk
Review.Contenu: I’ve had no issues with Fizz. They keep a good eye on everything and have been responsive when I’ve filled out request tickets. Card is easy to use and really appreciate the credit card/debit card balance. Would definitely recommend.

Fizz has been absolutely amazing. Fizz is honestly the best credit builder I have used after a recommendation from a YouTuber I enjoy watching known as Caleb Hammer. Fizz is perfect if you have no credit or you are trying to build credit. If you are in college or highschool it is a must! Fizz also has a great rewards program! I have been using Fizz for almost a year now and my credit score is nearing 700. If you are scared of the evils or credit cards look at fizz as a safe haven!

Review.Titre: Exactly what they said it does
Review.Contenu: I have been using Fizz as my regular every day card since April 2023 and I am very much so enjoying it. I am studying abroad and it is definitely the easiest card to use while here. My credit score has also gone up 20 or 30 points since I started using Fizz. Thank you!!

The Daily Autopay is an amazing feature that helps build credit without having to manually pay off my card. I can use Fizz as a replacement for my debit card while building credit and earning reward points.

Using Fizz is hustle free. I don’t have to worry about remembering to pay my outstanding balance due to the automatic repayment feature of Fizz. In addition, the card works seamlessly for both online and in-store purchases.

Review.Titre: I am a new student with absolutely zero…
Review.Contenu: I am a new student with absolutely zero credit. My only option before FIZZ was to get a secured car which would have set me back financially $500! I could t afford that, but neither could I afford to be stagnant. FIZZ offered me an excellent solution. I’m very happy with them.
I’ve been using Fizz for a month now and they have been amazing! Their customer service, cash back rewards, and obviously helping me build my credit, in my eyes makes them a 10/10
Geeat card if you are not a credit card person!

Sometimes the app can be difficult to use, depending on how big your bank is. But every time I need help, customer service is like no other. Really. Super personable and helpful. Shoutout to Kidus! Thank y’all!
Fizz has been an incredible experience thus far. It has been extremely easy to raise my credit score. I haven’t had any issues with any process yet!
Great experience so far! Makes keeping up with paying card off by having a daily pay off built into the card. Great customer service too!

I have used similar debit cards that build credit and Fizz has been the easiest to set up and use. While others are inconsistent, Fizz has never missed a day of automatic payments or failed to keep me up to date on my finances. The rewards points are great and accrue fast. The app just works! Flawlessly. And Fast too! I appreciate the customer support too. Get a Fizz card. You'll like it too!

Review.Titre: The best app for students trying to…
Review.Contenu: The best app for students trying to build credit. Easy and straightforward. The limit helps with budgeting and prevents overspending. Customer service is quick and simple!!
Fantastic company!, love the way i can use my fizz card and help my credit !, great way to build credit with just a debit card I definitely recommend everyone to try out the Fizz Card.

Review.Titre: I love that I can spend without ever…
Review.Contenu: I love that I can spend without ever worry about a payment and the rewards program super solid. Fizz was simple to set up and easy to use. I would love to see some more Fizz products in the future. Especially one with unique travel rewards.

Review.Titre: Love this for building credit as a beginner!
Review.Contenu: It’s so hard to get approved for a credit card if you don’t have credit history, so I’m so glad Fizz is available as a resource to help us beginners :)

Review.Titre: Fizz is helping me build self discipline AND my credit; love it!
Review.Contenu: I have been using Fizz for approximately 3 months and I love it. It helps me build discipline in knowing that my credit limit is not extensive, and thus I have to use the funds available in a smart way as it will be charged to my bank later that day. The reward system is also very generous, as you can choose the spending category in which you want to earn points. So far, I haven’t found anything to complain about regarding the card, but one thing I am wondering is how often the credit limit can be redetermined. Lastly, I think the auto pay function is a benefit that I’ve enjoyed greatly. I have seen on my Experian report that the consistency in making those Fizz payments is positively affecting my credit and I can’t wait to see how much more I can grow my credit with Fizz. I honestly don’t see myself going back to the conventional credit card as this ensures that I don’t spend money I don’t have nor that I get myself into difficult positions with overspending my credit limit. I hope that others can benefit as much as I have from this card.

Review.Titre: They have helped me understand how…
Review.Contenu: They have helped me understand how credit and credit cards worked. As well as a very easy and accessible way to manage my spending.

Review.Titre: Customer service with Fizz has always…
Review.Contenu: Customer service with Fizz has always been great. I had an issue with a purchase and it was resolved very quickly. I’m so glad I decided to get a Fizz card. I’ve recommended it to anyone who needs help working on credit.

Review.Titre: My bank not let me transfer money…
Review.Contenu: My bank not let me transfer money directly to PayPal different online banking or I have to wait 4 days to transfer be at complete but whit fizz it’s at the moment

Review.Titre: Easy to apply, easy to use
Review.Contenu: Was easy to apply and use the card online right away. The physical card shipped quickly, I’ve had no issues using it. I like that this is helping me start building my credit.
It’s amazing because it keeps track of how much you have available and won’t let you spend over that amount

Review.Titre: Reliable and trustworthy! Best Credit Card
Review.Contenu: As a college student who struggles with finances, Fizz truly has given me hope in spending better and allowing me to balance my spending more properly. I highly recommend this to anyone looking to better their credit, especially for college students needing a boost.
Got rewarded by points which seem worth a penny for one point. After my first month using the card my Credit score went up and I had $10 in rewards.

Review.Titre: No Interest. No Debt. All The Credit.
Review.Contenu: Fizz has been a very easy means for me to build credit without worrying about debt, potential late fees, and interest. Almost everyone wants to build credit, but credit cards aren't for everyone. Some people are not good at managing spending, so they might rack up debt or hit their credit limit. This isn't an issue with Fizz, since your spending limit is based on how much you actually have in the bank. The lack of interest is one of the biggest advantages to Fizz. There is no APR or interest due while using Fizz. This means a lot to me because I am a practicing Muslim, and interest is forbidden in our faith. Without Fizz, I would have to keep a close eye on a credit card to make sure I'd never be charged interest, but still run the risk of it. Fizz is a gamechanger.Last but not least, Fizz's customer service is excellent. Shout-out to Kidus! He was very responsive and attentive for every issue I faced, and either gave me solutions or a promise to get back to me with an answer, which he did. If you're not using Fizz by now, you're missing out, genuinely. I highly recommend building credit with Fizz!

Review.Titre: My credit score has gone up
Review.Contenu: My credit score has gone up, the app is easy to use and understand. It has Gen Z vibes. I genuinely love it.
It’s been great for me. As a student it can be a bit difficult to get a good credit card. The fizz card not only gives me some pretty good rewards it also teaches me things about credit

Review.Titre: Fizz has always been super great with…
Review.Contenu: Fizz has always been super great with handling everything and making everything easy. I literally do not worry because I know I don’t have to think about late payments or missing a payment

Review.Titre: I’ve had a really great experience…
Review.Contenu: I’ve had a really great experience using Fizz so far, and their customer service has been great every time I’ve interacted with it.

Customer service is always quick to respond and never over complicates things. Both Carlo and Sam helped me on different occasions and both were fantastic! It’s rare these days to find a business that actually values their customers and isn’t 100% profit driven.

Review.Titre: The company is very quick to respond
Review.Contenu: The company is very quick to respond, and very helpful if you have any questions. And the service they provide is also great.

Review.Titre: It's easy to use and the auto pay ID…
Review.Contenu: It's easy to use and the auto pay ID great for maintaining a budget and trying to limit unecessary spending
Awesome product that’s increasing my credit and the customer service support has been amazing and very helpful so far !
Love the rewards and building credit!

Review.Titre: Fizz is super easy to use
Review.Contenu: Fizz is super easy to use. I am able to budget carefully, improve my credit, and gain rewards!!

Review.Titre: My favorite everyday card for purchases…
Review.Contenu: My favorite everyday card for purchases and traveling, while building my credit score to purchase my own home in the future.
It’s grate. I’ve already seen a big jump in my credit score in only two months. Amazing!!! If I could give more than 5 stars I absolutely would.
Very patient and kind. Never gave up on my issue and was very understanding and generous.

Review.Titre: Saved me a ton of money & improved my…
Review.Contenu: Saved me a ton of money & improved my credit score as advertised. Also just a super well-made app never their marketing tik toks are hilarious

i love everything about fizz. the daily autopay. the cash back. the cute black card. the app. all of it is so nice. and so helpful for a university student. it’s fantastic. i just wish my ex hadn’t told me about it lol
Fizz is awesome. It’s the perfect card to use in college. It keeps me from overspending while building my credit and helping me earn rewards. I can’t recommend it highly enough.

I love my Fizz card! It has great discounts at Harvard and whenever I need something there’s a chat right in the app that connects me to a team member. They’re always super helpful. 100% would recommend!

Review.Titre: Excellent way to start building credit…
Review.Contenu: Excellent way to start building credit for anyone just starting off amazing point system and easy and understandable user interface highly recommend Fizz

Review.Titre: Great card for students to build…
Review.Contenu: Great card for students to build credit! I have bad credit and was still approved! Thank you!

Review.Titre: Best starting option for international students
Review.Contenu: It's my first credit card and it is immediate to get for a foreign student.It is a great company, support is immediat, I would suggest anyone get this card.
Fast sign up, very clear on their model and benefits.
Easy to use and manage, plus I noticed a huge improvement in my credit score after using fizz. This is my go-to card for all my daily needs.
Simple and easy process to get started haven’t seen anything come from it but just started. Can’t hurt and seems like it’s going to be great

Review.Titre: Nothing but great experience with this…
Review.Contenu: Nothing but great experience with this app.

Quick and sincere customer service and help
The experience has been seamless and am able to take advantage of discounts in my area.
